name: tomtom-mcp-server
title: TomTom MCP Server
summary: The TomTom MCP Server is a managed service that provides AI systems with essential, real-time geolocation capabilities—including search, multi-modal routing, and more.
description: The TomTom MCP Server is a managed service that provides AI systems with essential, real-time geolocation capabilities—including search, multi-modal routing, and more.

useCases.name: Search & Geocoding
useCases.description: Converts addresses/locations into precise coordinates, performs reverse lookups, and executes fuzzy searches for points of interest (POIs) globally.

useCases.name: Multi-Modal Routing
useCases.description: Calculates optimized routes for various transportation methods, including driving, cycling, and walking, enabling complex door-to-door journey planning.

useCases.name: Real-Time Traffic Context
useCases.description: Provides current Traffic Incidents and flow data for making dynamic, effective route decisions, rerouting, and generating predictive Estimated Times of Arrival (ETAs).

useCases.name: Visual Context (Static Maps)
useCases.description: Generates visual representations (static map images) of routes or locations for reporting, workflow consumption, or human verification.
